glsa.title: QEMU: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in QEMU, the worst of which could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in QEMU. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code, cause a Denial of Service condition, obtain sensitive information, or bypass security restrictions.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All QEMU users should upgrade to the latest version:
